metadata.title: CVE-2013-2039 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in lib/files/view.php in ownCloud before4.0.15, 4.5.x 4.5.11, and 5.x before 5.0.6 allows remote authenticatedusers to access arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
